title: Ethereum Foundation reveals latest work on ‘Interop Layer’ to make L2 ecosystem ‘feel like one chain’
contentSnippet: The Ethereum Foundation published a blog post outlining the goals for the upcoming Ethereum Interop Layer, now open for testing.

title: Chainlink's LINK Bounces 4% to Near $14 as Cryptos Rebound
contentSnippet: LINK could target $14.50 if momentum sustains, CoinDesk Research's analysis tool suggested.

title: Bitcoin Backwardation Returns, a Pattern That Often Marks Market Bottoms
contentSnippet: Futures prices for BTC are trading below spot prices, signaling "extreme fear," which can sometimes be read as a contrarian buy signal.

title: Sen. Warren Keeps Pressure on Trump Crypto Ties as Market Structure Bill Negotiated
contentSnippet: Senator Elizabeth Warren is maintaining political heat on President Trump's World Liberty Financial business interests in a letter to the Treasury and DOJ.

title: Crypto ATM operating company and CEO charged in alleged $10 million money laundering scheme

title: Google Releases Its Most Powerful AI Model, Gemini 3—Here's What You Need to Know
contentSnippet: Google's Gemini 3 Pro outperforms previous models across reasoning and multimodal benchmarks. It's available on AI Studio, but not the consumer Gemini app.

title: BTC Dipped to $90K! BTC wipes out 2025 Gains! Monad CoFounder Interview!

title: Revolut, Mastercard tap Polygon for new integrations
contentSnippet: Revolut is embedding Polygon in its app to enable "zero-fee" remittances, POL staking, and in-app crypto card payments.

title: Standard Chartered says bitcoin sell-off likely over, eyes year-end rally
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s recent correction appears to have run its course, according to Standard Chartered’s Geoffrey Kendrick.

title: Hyperliquid treasury merger vote delayed, postponing $888 million deal
contentSnippet: A merger to form a Hyperliquid digital asset treasury with aspirations of raising $1 billion will take at least another two weeks to complete.

title: Prediction Market Myriad Partners With Walrus Decentralized Data Storage Layer
contentSnippet: The partnership will see Myriad media stored on the developer platform, creating an immutable record with applications in DeFi and AI.

title: Mt. Gox Moves Nearly $1 Billion in Bitcoin—Are More Repayments Imminent?
contentSnippet: Wallets belonging to defunct Bitcoin exchange Mt. Gox moved nearly $1 billion worth of the top crypto asset on Tuesday.

title: Cloudflare Outage Sends Shockwaves Through Crypto, Renewing Push for DePIN

title: Bitcoin Gains Tuesday as Traditional Markets Slump in Rare Occurrence of Crypto Outperformance
contentSnippet: After plunging below $90,000 overnight, BTC has regained the $93,000 level in U.S. morning action.

title: U.S. Regulator OCC Clarifies How Banks Can Handle Network 'Gas Fees'
contentSnippet: The U.S. Office of the Comptroller of the Currency explained to the national banks it oversees how they can hold crypto for paying gas fees.

title: Bitcoin Miner Canaan’s Stock Spikes After Q3 Revenue Rise, Even as BTC Falls
contentSnippet: Canaan’s stock jumped Tuesday after the Bitcoin mining firm reported a revenue spike, though Bitcoin fell to a seven-month low overnight.

title: Filecoin Foundation, FilOz unveil decentralized cloud to build more resilient and customizable apps

title: Société Générale’s SG-FORGE Issues First Tokenized Bond in U.S.

title: Canaan shares rise 18% on gross-profit turnaround, doubled revenue and record bitcoin holdings
contentSnippet: Canaan is leaning on new A16 bitcoin mining hardware and North American expansion to support a stronger Q4 outlook.

title: Bitcoin Sell-Off Likely 'Complete', Rally Into Year-End Still in Play: StanChart Analyst

title: XLM Slips 3.2% to $0.25 as Altcoin Purge Continues
contentSnippet: Stellar drops from $0.2577 amid broad consolidation, but technical bounce from $0.248 signals buying interest remains intact.

title: Revolut Enlists Polygon for Stablecoin Remittances in UK and EEA
contentSnippet: Revolut customers in the UK and non-European Union EEA countries can do crypto remittances in USDC, USDT, and POL.

title: New Wave of Solana ETFs Hits the Markets as Fidelity, Canary, and VanEck Roll Out

title: Cloudflare global network outage hits multiple crypto front-ends in widespread disruption
contentSnippet: Cloudflare experienced a service degradation issue on Tuesday that spilled over into multiple crypto front-ends.

title: Bitcoin capitulation wave builds as ETF outflows, rate shocks hit crypto: analysts

title: Bitcoin Drops to Seven-Month Low Under $90K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs have bled hundreds of millions as the market outlook deteriorates, driven by profit-taking and portfolio rebalancing.

title: Two Technical Signals Hinting at a Bitcoin Bear Market
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's bear market outlook firms as 80% of key on-chain metrics flash red, with derivatives and options traders betting on more downside.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.
